title: Enforcer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Enforce the law at an authorized target's house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > When you enforce the law at someone's house, anyone who tries to visit them to do a negative action (attack, frame, roleblock, etc.), will be roleblocked. Authorized targets who visit your target will be roleblocked, even if their action was not negative, and they will be roleblocked through immunity.

desc:
Post 2120
*"I don't make the rules, I just choose where to enforce them."*
